sentences.sContent: If you see a falling star, don't wonder why, just make a wish.
sentences.sCn: 如果您看到一颗流星，不要怀疑，只要许一个愿。

sentences.sContent: "Please make a wish when you fill in a single circular eye," Fukuda explained to Bush, according to the Japanese official.
sentences.sCn: 据这位日本官员介绍，福田首相向布什总统解释说，“画上一只眼睛后，请许下生日愿望。”

sentences.sContent: It is now my birthday. In the US, we have a tradition that when you blow out the candles on your birthday cake, you should make a wish.
sentences.sCn: 今天是我的生日.在美国,有这样一个传统:当你吹灭生日蛋糕上的蜡烛的时候,就可以许一个愿望.
